name: Puck Daddy's Obstacle Course
description:
Hello everyone, welcome to Puck Daddy!

This is a simple one-leveled obstacle course that I made in unity as my first game! I got a little carried away and put a little too much effort into it, but I really like how it turned out!

The game includes an online leaderboard so you can compare your scores with a bunch of other people. If you can beat it without getting hit you get extra points! I've only had one person beat it hitless so far, can you?

I'm uploading it for free, if anyone wants to donate that's cool, but you really don't have to. If this is popular enough I might consider making more levels in a future update, or maybe just make a Puck Daddy 2.

I hope you all enjoy! NOW WITH CONTROLLER SUPPORT!!!
